snippet.title: Dusk Tactics v0.0.7 - Full Combat
snippet.description:
This is the longest video so far that shows a full combat experience. It is still VERY early in the development process and a lot of bugs exist.

We go now to a 3 vs 3 battle on a small map in an area known as the Druid Pass, a vast grassland with many pathways going through it.

The enemy has two (2) Bandits and one (1) Scout who has occupied the high ground. We can tell the enemy units by their purple tinted clothes. Also the enemy Scout has a beard so of course he's evil.

Our heroes(?) are a Warrior, an Acolyte, and a Scout. The Acolyte is wearing a ton of armor as I forgot to remove it...so he has a bit of an advantage.

The Warrior and Scout do most of the offense, but the Acolyte does get in a few licks of his own.

After combat is over, we see the victory screen which shows us our spoils of war!

Looks like we got the enemy Scout's bow~

See more on this channel, follow/subscribe for updates and follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/DuskTactics
